Object.Text: Reservoir outflow temperature figures compare simulated and observed temperature time series from January through December to aid calibration. Time (date) is represented on the x-axis and temperature (%%degrees%%F) is represented on the y-axis. Four lines are included in the figure: observed (light blue) and simulated (red-dashed) hourly water temperature and observed (dark blue) and simulated (dark red dashed) daily average water temperature. In certain instances, time series for multiple years are shown to indicate comparison of observed data and model simulations for longer time periods.

Object.Title: %%region%%, Simulation: %%SimulationName%% %%year%%
Object.Description: Goodwin Reservoir hourly outflow temperature, %%year%%. ResSim.

Goodwin Reservoir hourly outflow temperature, annual performance statistics, shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (mean bias: +/- 1.35%%units%%, MAE: %%gt%%1.80%%units%%, RMSE: %%gt%%2.70%%units%%, NSE: %%lt%%0.65). ResSim.
Goodwin Reservoir hourly outflow temperature, monthly means (%%units%%) and counts. ResSim.
Goodwin Reservoir hourly outflow temperature, monthly average mean bias (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (+/- 1.35%%units%%). CE-QUAL-W2.
Goodwin Reservoir hourly outflow temperature, monthly average MAE (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (%%gt%%1.80%%units%%). ResSim.
Goodwin Reservoir hourly outflow temperature, monthly average RMSE (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (%%gt%%2.70%%units%%). ResSim.
Goodwin Reservoir hourly outflow temperature, monthly average NSE (%%units%%), shaded gray cells with an asterisk are outside the model performance metric range (%%lt%%0.65). ResSim.

In certain instances, time series for multiple years are shown to indicate comparison of observed data and model simulations for longer time periods.
